text: Kaadu A-korosul Ni-Qhuraanih aayoota baxxaqqa luk keenil tankirriyime waqdi, koroosite marih foocittel faxewaynan kee naqabu table, Nabiyow moominiinik Ni-aayoota keenil yakriyeeh, Yallah ken seeca mara uma atkah aatuke Raarra haan, moominiiniy Qhuraan siinil takriyeh liton naqabuk, sin garil wohuk naqabuh gibiduk Raqtam siinih warsoo?keenik ixxic Nabiyow: woh giray Yalli koroosite mara kah xagnise kinni akeeral, kaadu gira is manxu uma gacsimeynay fan kak gacaana kinni
